mapper.sql: select mapping_id, tenant_id, liquor_batch_id, pottery_altar_id, actual_weight, real_status, storing_time, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark from laocz_batch_pottery_mapping
mapper.select:
SELECT pam.pottery_altar_number AS potteryAltarNumber, lm.liquor_name AS liquorName, lb.liquor_batch_id AS liquorBatchId, bpm.actual_weight AS actualWeight, DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, bpm.storing_time) AS retentionDays, lm.liquor_level AS liquorLevel, lm.liquor_round AS liquorRound, lm.liquor_flavor_name AS liquorFlavorName, lm.liquor_source AS liquorSource, lm.liquor_year AS liquorYear, lm.liquor_brewing_time AS liquorBrewingTime, lm.liquor_content AS liquorContent, fzi.fire_zone_name AS fireZoneName, ai.area_name AS areaName, bpm.create_by, bpm.create_time FROM laocz_pottery_altar_management pam LEFT JOIN laocz_batch_pottery_mapping bpm ON bpm.pottery_altar_id = pam.pottery_altar_id LEFT JOIN laocz_liquor_batch lb ON bpm.liquor_batch_id = lb.liquor_batch_id LEFT JOIN laocz_liquor_management lm ON lb.liquor_management_id = lm.liquor_management_id LEFT JOIN laocz_fire_zone_info fzi ON pam.fire_zone_id = fzi.fire_zone_id LEFT JOIN laocz_area_info ai ON fzi.area_id = ai.area_id
pam.pottery_altar_number = #{potteryAltarNumber}
mapper.insert:
insert into laocz_batch_pottery_mapping ( mapping_id , tenant_id , liquor_batch_id , pottery_altar_id , actual_weight , real_status , storing_time , create_time , create_by , update_time , update_by , remark) values
( #{item.mappingId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.liquorBatchId}, #{item.potteryAltarId}, #{item.actualWeight}, #{item.realStatus}, #{item.storingTime}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.remark})
